typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_c0} as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		China as double,
		India as double,
		US as double,
		{EU27&UK} as double,
		Russia as double,
		Japan as double,
		Brazil as double,
		ROW as double,
		InternationalAviation as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Aviation
source(output(
		{_c0} as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		China as double,
		India as double,
		US as double,
		{EU27&UK} as double,
		Russia as double,
		Japan as double,
		Brazil as double,
		ROW as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> GroundTransport
source(output(
		{_c0} as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		China as double,
		India as double,
		US as double,
		{EU27&UK} as double,
		Russia as double,
		Japan as double,
		Brazil as double,
		ROW as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Industry
source(output(
		{_c0} as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		China as double,
		India as double,
		US as double,
		{EU27&UK} as double,
		Russia as double,
		Japan as double,
		Brazil as double,
		ROW as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Power
source(output(
		{_c0} as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		China as double,
		India as double,
		US as double,
		{EU27&UK} as double,
		Russia as double,
		Japan as double,
		Brazil as double,
		ROW as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Resindential
Aviation unpivot(output(
		Country as string,
		Value as double
	),
	ungroupBy({_c0}),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot1
GroundTransport unpivot(output(
		Country as string,
		Value as double
	),
	ungroupBy({_c0}),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot2
Industry unpivot(output(
		Country as string,
		Value as double
	),
	ungroupBy({_c0}),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot3
Power unpivot(output(
		Country as string,
		Value as double
	),
	ungroupBy({_c0}),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot4
Resindential unpivot(output(
		Country as string,
		Value as double
	),
	ungroupBy({_c0}),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot5
Unpivot1, Unpivot2, Unpivot3, Unpivot4, Unpivot5 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 pivot(groupBy({_c0}),
	pivotBy(Country, ['China', 'India', 'US', 'EU27&UK', 'Russia', 'Japan', 'Brazil']),
	{} = round(sum(Value), 2),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
Pivot1 sink(input(
		DATE as timestamp,
		China as double,
		India as double,
		US as double,
		{EU27&UK} as double,
		Russia as double,
		Japan as double,
		Brazil as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		DATE = {_c0},
		India,
		US,
		{EU27&UK},
		Russia,
		Japan,
		Brazil
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
